description: High temperature series for spin-1/2 Heisenberg specific heat on 2D square lattice.
references: G. A. Baker et al., On the two-dimensional, spin-1/2 Heisenberg ferromagnetic models, Phys. Lett., 25A (1967), 207-209.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to specific heat
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
